required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy of Hyaluronic Acid and Platelet-rich Plasma Combination in Knee Osteoarthritis
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy of Intra-articular Injection of Combined Hyaluronic Acid and Platelet-rich Plasma in Knee Degenerative Joint Disease

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of intra-articular injections of combined hyaluronic acid and platelet-rich plasma in knee degenerative joint disease in improving joint function and reducing pain.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 6 months after the first intra-articular injection
primary_outcome.description: Comparison of WOMAC total score among three treatment arms

arm_group.description: Intra-articular injections of hyaluronic acid combined with platelet-rich plasma

intervention.description: Intra-articular injections of hyaluronic acid combined with platelet-rich plasma

overall_official.affiliation: Azienda Socio Sanitaria Territoriale Centro Specialistico Ortopedico Traumatologico Gaetano Pini - CTO

facility.name: U.O.C. 1a Divisione, Azienda Socio Sanitaria Territoriale Centro Specialistico Ortopedico Traumatologico Gaetano Pini-CTO
